privacyPolicy.introduction: Connectly values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application. By using the Service, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

informationWeCollect.locationData: If you allow location services, we may collect geolocation data to provide location-based services such as nearby users.
informationWeCollect.communicationData: We may collect data from interactions you have with customer service or support teams, including chat messages, email correspondence, or phone calls.

howWeUseYourInformation.toProvideCustomerSupport: To respond to inquiries, provide support, and resolve issues related to bookings and services.
howWeUseYourInformation.toImproveOurService: To analyze user behavior, improve the functionality of the app, and enhance the user experience.
howWeUseYourInformation.forCommunication: To send service-related communications, including message request confirmations, reminders, and promotional offers (if you opt in).
howWeUseYourInformation.toComplyWithLegalObligations: To comply with applicable laws, regulations, and legal requests.

sharingYourInformation.serviceProviders: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who help us manage our operations, such as payment processors, hosting services, and customer support tools.
sharingYourInformation.businessTransfers: If our business is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
sharingYourInformation.legalCompliance: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to a subpoena, court order, or other legal process.
sharingYourInformation.withYourConsent: We may share your information with third parties when you have given us explicit consent.

privacyPolicy.dataRetention: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide the Service to you, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. If you delete your account or request that we remove your data, we will retain your information as required for legal and operational purposes.

yourRightsAndChoices.accessAndUpdate: You can access and update your personal information at any time through your account settings.
yourRightsAndChoices.deleteYourAccount: You can request or delete your account and associated personal information
yourRightsAndChoices.optOutOfMarketingCommunications: You can opt out of receiving promotional emails or other marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe link in the email or by contacting us directly.
yourRightsAndChoices.locationServices: You can disable location tracking by adjusting your device settings, though this may affect certain features of the Service.
yourRightsAndChoices.dataPortability: You may request a copy of your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
yourRightsAndChoices.restrictProcessing: You may request that we restrict the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances.

privacyPolicy.security: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, alteration, or destruction. This includes the use of encryption, secure servers, and access controls. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyLinks: Our app may contain links to third-party websites, services, or applications that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.
privacyPolicy.childrensPrivacy: Our Service is not intended for children under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete such information.
privacyPolicy.changesToThisPolicy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page with an updated 'Effective Date.' Please review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.
